resources.string:
Welcome to the English Quiz! 
 Here you're going to try to pass some quiz. 
 Try to get the max score! 
 Press "START" to start the quiz!

The app was designed by a student from HTC who\'ve dreamed to design an app just for fun. \n In the future he\'s going to make some other applications for phones. \n One of the coming app is - The History of Kyrgyzstan Book with BAT Inc.
